title: Ayo Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the ayo CLI tool

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for IDE support

agents_dir.description: Directory for user-created agents. Defaults to ~/.config/ayo/agents

skills_dir.description: Directory for user shared skills. Defaults to ~/.config/ayo/skills

system_prefix.description: Path to system prompt prefix file. If empty, uses paths.FindPromptFile('system-prefix.md')

system_suffix.description: Path to system prompt suffix file. If empty, uses paths.FindPromptFile('system-suffix.md')

catwalk_base_url.description: Base URL for Catwalk API. Defaults to CATWALK_URL env var or http://localhost:8080

id.description: Provider identifier used for API key environment variable lookup

api_endpoint.description: API endpoint URL for the provider

delegates.description: Maps task types to agent handles for global delegation

default_tools.description: Maps tool type aliases to concrete tool names. Allows agents to use generic tool types (like 'search') that resolve to user-configured tools (like 'searxng')
